actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to specify that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical psychologists.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to allow health maintenance organizations to provide clinical psychologist services.

titles.title: A bill to specify that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical psychologists.
